alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 12 at 6:25PM CDT until May 12 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN THOMAS...SOUTHEASTERN NORTON...SHERIDAN AND GRAHAM COUNTIES... At 624 PM CDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 6 miles east of Prairie View to near Park, moving southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility at times with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Public via social media and State Highway webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 40 and 75. Locations impacted include... Colby, Oakley, Hill City, Hoxie, Grinnell, Levant and Lenora. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
